Posts.Title: Breast Question

Posts.Content: I've moved this discussion to the breast cancer group. There's an FAQ section linked at the bottom of the pages in the forums if any advice is required. Regards, Alan Report Thank you. I just thought it was important that sherrie got the right advice and support  Report Thank you so much!!! I was at a loss on how to proceed. Thank you so much Matron Sherrie Report I truly appreciate you moving this to the right place. I'm new to the site and I have a lot of questions. It is very nice to talk with others going through the same issues. Thank you again Sherrie Report Good luck sherrie  Report
